thread.title_full: CCBdance Project Presents Free Performances at UNC Asheville (The University of North Carolina at Asheville) ... - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: CCBdance Project Presents Free Performances at UNC Asheville (The University of North Carolina at Asheville) ...
text: ( Source : The University of North Carolina at Asheville ) CCBdance Project , a dance company based in Asheville and Abidjan, Ivory Coast , will present an excerpt of a repertory solo work, Kenbe, Amour Colere Folie: Improvisations for Love ,
